title: Sunpower
creator_credit: Dan Bessie, Barr Films and Shire Films
brief_description: An animated film tracing the history of our knowledge about the sun, also showing the ways in which the earth is dependent on the sun. The use of solar energy, emphasizing the power potential of the sun is also described.
creator_credit_for_label: Dan Bessie, Barr Films and Shire Films
